import {useState} from 'react'; import "./navbar.scss"; import {Search, Notifications, ArrowDropDown} from '@material-ui/icons'; const Navbar = () => { const [isScrolled, setIsScrolled] = useState(false); window.onScroll = () => { setIsScrolled(window.pageYOffset === 0 ? false : true) return () => window.onScroll = null } console.log(isScrolled); return(
Homepage Series Movies New and Popular My list
KIDS
Settings Logout
) } export default Navbar;
